archimate:Requirement.name: R3.4 Basic Security Baseline education
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U10 As CISO I want to be able to educate the organisation in the area of basic security controls to raise the minimal competency level and understanding within the organization. U11 As CISO I want to ensure that stakeholders understand what the security baseline does and doesn't do to avoid miscommunication and overcommitment and to promote better understanding.
